remarks: A space is compact iff every ultrafilter converges.  (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 11-Dec-2009.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 12-Apr-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Aug-2015.)
statement:
ufilcmp $p |- ( ( X e. UFL /\ J e. ( TopOn ` X ) ) -> ( J e. Comp <-> A. f e. ( UFil ` X ) ( J fLim f ) =/= (/) ) ) $.
$d J f $.
$d X f $.
